org.apache.storm.druid.bolt

Interface DruidBeamFactory<E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    the preferred way to ingest streaming events to druid is through Kafka, as such storm-druid is deprecated and will be removed in 2.x releases of storm.

    @Deprecated
public interface DruidBeamFactory<E>
extends Serializable

    Factory to create Druid Beams.
